channel.title: Multiple message sending help

item.title: Multiple message sending help
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Whenever I click on something that requires the int nzpoints, it repeats the message I have set.

if(objectID == 170 && nzpoints >= 1000){
sM("The mystery box opens.....");
addItem(Item.randomChest(), 1);
addItem(4740, misc.random(35));
sM("And you get a random item!");
resetPos();
} else {
sM("You need more points!");
}
if(objectID == 11470 && nzpoints >= 1200){
ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID, -2, 0);
} else {
sM("You need more points!");
}

And I have that for 4 things. It seems whenever something uses && nzpoints >= XXXXX, the rest of the objects are greater than that, so they send their message too.

Read full topic
